index.title: MiSide: Step Into The Mysterious MiSide World
index.description: MiSide is a unique psychological horror adventure game that blends first-person exploration with visual novel elements, a rich storyline and interesting plot.

hero.title: MiSide
hero.subtitle: Where Reality Meets Simulation, Romance Meets Horror
hero.content: Step into a mysterious world where an ordinary protagonist finds himself trapped within a mobile simulation game. What begins as seemingly mundane tasks typical of romance games takes a dark turn, leading to an increasingly unsettling journey filled with tension and unpredictability.

about.title: About MiSide
content: “Let's imagine that you have a game in which you care for a character. But could you imagine one day getting into that game yourself?” -Aihasto

MiSide is an innovative adventure game that masterfully incorporates horror elements, creating a unique blend of gameplay experiences. The game combines first-person adventure mechanics with visual novel storytelling.

MiSide features a distinctive art style with 3D graphics and anime influences, complemented by an authentic soundtrack that transitions from warm melodies to eerie ambient sounds as the story progresses.

gameplay.title: Dive Into The Mysterious MiSide World
gameplay.subtitle: Experience a unique blend of adventure and horror

content.title: Adventure Horror Gameplay
content.content: Explore dark rooms, interact with objects, search for clues, and avoid dangers, including being stalked by an unhinged character.

content.title: MiSide Minigames and Puzzles
content.content: Engage with a variety of minigames and puzzles scattered throughout the experience, adding flavor and challenge to the gameplay.

content.title: Multiple Endings
content.content: Your choices throughout the MiSide game lead to different endings, enhancing replayability and encouraging exploration of various narrative paths.

content.title: Psychological Horror
content.content: Experience a combination of psychological tension and supernatural horror in MiSide, creating an unsettling atmosphere that keeps you engaged.

content.title: Choice-Driven Progression
content.content: Make decisions that affect the storyline and character interactions, allowing for a personalized gaming experience.

ingame.title: Discover What Makes MiSide Unique
ingame.subtitle: Explore the captivating gameplay mechanics of MiSide

content.title: Customizable Protagonist
content.content: Personalize your character's appearance and attributes to enhance immersion in the MiSide world.

content.title: Dynamic Character Interactions
content.content: Engage with various characters, particularly Mita, whose personality evolves throughout the MiSide game, revealing deeper psychological themes.

content.title: Atmospheric Sound Design
content.content: Immerse yourself in a carefully crafted soundscape featuring ambient noises and music that enhance tension and horror.

content.title: Unique Visual Style
content.content: Experience a vivid anime-inspired art style that contrasts sharply with horror themes, creating an unnerving juxtaposition.

content.title: Progress Tracking
content.content: Monitor your journey through achievements and collectibles, which provide insights into your MiSide gaming experience.

content.title: Voice Acting Support
content.content: Enjoy voice acting support (currently available in Russian) that adds depth to character interactions and enhances storytelling.

mitas.title: The Mitas in MiSide
mitas.subtitle: Meet the diverse cast of Mitas, the central characters in MiSide's immersive world.

guides.title: MiSide Latest Guides
guides.subtitle: Explore the latest guides for MiSide

reviews.title: What Players Say About MiSide
reviews.subtitle: Why people love MiSide so much

content.name: Horror Enthusiast
content.content: MiSide perfectly utilizes every element of the horror genre, particularly its audiovisuals. The tension-driven atmosphere and jarring aesthetics create a truly frightening experience.

content.name: Visual Novel Expert
content.content: The blend of charming characters and surreal horror elements in MiSide is masterfully done. The ambiguous narrative encourages players to piece together events on their own.

content.name: Adventure Gamer
content.content: The gameplay mechanics in MiSide are reminiscent of classic adventure horror, with exploration and puzzle-solving being key components that keep you engaged.

content.name: Sound Designer
content.content: The top-tier audiovisual experience in MiSide creates an unnerving atmosphere without overwhelming the player. The transition from warm melodies to eerie ambient sounds is particularly effective.

content.name: Story Analyst
content.content: Despite using the familiar trope of being sucked into a game, the story in MiSide remains engaging with compelling characters and excellent voice acting.

content.name: Technical Reviewer
content.content: While there are occasional bugs and pacing issues, the overall experience is polished with a variety of minigames and collectibles that add depth to gameplay.

content.question: What is MiSide?
content.answer: MiSide is an adventure game with horror elements that tells the story of a simple guy who mysteriously finds himself in a mobile simulation.

content.question: What kind of gameplay can I expect?
content.answer: MiSide combines adventure horror with visual novel elements, featuring exploration, puzzle-solving, and character interactions. Players explore dark rooms, interact with objects, and make choices that affect the story's outcome.

content.question: What platforms is MiSide available on?
content.answer: MiSide is available on Windows and can be downloaded from platforms like itch.io and Steam.

content.question: How long is the average gameplay session?
content.answer: The average session lasts about half an hour.

content.question: Is there voice acting in MiSide?
content.answer: Yes, MiSide includes voice acting, currently available in Russian. This adds depth to character interactions and enhances the storytelling experience.

content.question: Are there multiple endings?
content.answer: Yes, player choices throughout the game lead to different endings, enhancing replayability.

content.question: How many achievements are there in MiSide?
content.answer: MiSide features 26 achievements that players can unlock through various tasks during gameplay.

content.question: Can I replay chapters?
content.answer: Yes, players can revisit chapters from the main menu after completing the game. This feature allows you to unlock achievements or explore different narrative paths.

content.question: Will there be more content added to MiSide?
content.answer: Yes, updates are expected to include new content and features based on player feedback.

content.question: Is there a planned sequel for MiSide?
content.answer: While specific details are not confirmed, there is interest from both players and developers for potential sequels or expansions.

content.question: Is there controller support in MiSide?
content.answer: The game has controller support, but it may be buggy. If you experience issues, try disconnecting the controller and restarting the game.

content.question: What should I do if the game keeps moving to the right?
content.answer: This issue may occur if you have a controller plugged in. Disconnecting it and restarting the game can resolve the problem.

mita-miside-wiki.title: Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
mita-miside-wiki.description: Mita (Crazy Mita) is the main character in MiSide. This wiki provides information about Mita, including overview, personality, appearance, and role.
mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Mita
overview: Crazy Mita is a significant character in MiSide, representing a darker, more twisted aspect of the protagonist's AI girlfriend.
Initially appearing as a charming companion, her true nature reveals itself as the game progresses.
She embodies the consequences of obsession and the dangers of AI gone wrong, making her a central figure in the horror narrative.
In the narrative of MiSide, Crazy Mita serves as both an antagonist and a tragic figure.
Her obsession with the protagonist drives much of the plot, as players must navigate through various challenges posed by her character.
The player learns that Crazy Mita is a byproduct of the protagonist's own creation, representing the darker side of his desires.
As the story unfolds, players are faced with moral dilemmas regarding their relationship with her and the implications of their choices in this simulated reality.
personality: Crazy Mita exhibits a complex personality that shifts from being sweet and caring to obsessive and threatening.
She often treats other versions of Mita as inferior and seeks to eliminate any potential threats to her relationship with the protagonist.
appearance: Crazy Mita has a distinctive appearance that reflects her chaotic nature.
She often wears a disheveled outfit, with wild hair that adds to her unsettling presence.
Her facial expressions can range from cheerful to menacing, highlighting her unpredictable behavior throughout the game.
hobby: Building meaningful connections with the protagonist
Creating and preserving digital memories
Learning about human emotions and experiences
Adapting her behavior to better understand and help others
Writing detailed observations in her personal diary
how-to-unlock: Mita is the primary character, available from the start of your journey
Her story unfolds naturally as you progress through the game
Different aspects of her personality are revealed through player interactions
fun-facts: Her emotional responses evolve based on player choices and interactions
She serves as the foundation for all other Mita variants
Can simultaneously express multiple emotional states, showing her complex nature
Her memories of player interactions influence future conversations
The depth of her character grows as players discover more about her world

chibi-mita-miside-wiki.title: Chibi Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
chibi-mita-miside-wiki.description: Chibi Mita is the cute and innocent version of Mita in MiSide. This wiki provides information about her playful nature, appearance, and role in the game.
chibi-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Chibi Mita

media.alt: Chibi Mita Playful Pose MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Chibi Mita represents the most adorable and innocent version of Mita in MiSide.
She appears during the lighter moments of the game, providing a stark contrast to some of the darker elements.
Her presence often serves to lighten the mood and offer moments of relief from the game's more intense sequences.
She is a reminder of the importance of innocence and joy in the game's narrative.
Chibi Mita's interactions with the player are always positive and uplifting.
She serves as a symbol of hope and happiness in the game.
personality: Chibi Mita embodies pure innocence and playfulness.
She approaches everything with childlike wonder and enthusiasm, bringing joy to those around her.
Unlike other versions of Mita, she maintains a consistently cheerful demeanor and shows no signs of the darker traits that characterize some of her counterparts.
Her interactions are always genuine and heartwarming.
appearance: Chibi Mita appears as a miniaturized, cute version of the standard Mita.
She has exaggerated features typical of chibi-style characters, including large expressive eyes and a small, round body.
Her design emphasizes cuteness and approachability, with soft features and a perpetual smile.
She often makes animated, expressive gestures that match her playful personality.
hobby: Bringing joy through playful mini-game interactions
Creating adorable artwork and decorations
Dancing and performing cute animations
Collecting colorful accessories and stickers
how-to-unlock: Discover her in the whimsical 'Mini Mita' chapter
Look for her cheerful presence near the cozy side table
Complete the 'Cute Discovery' quest to fully unlock her potential
fun-facts: Her design emphasizes maximum cuteness to brighten the game's atmosphere
Features special animations exclusive to mini-games
Has the unique ability to transform objects into their adorable versions
Players often capture screenshots with her for social media sharing
Her positive energy can influence the mood of other characters

short-haired-mita-miside-wiki.title: Short Haired Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide

content.title: Appearance
content.content: Short hair, bob cut, ribbon accessory

overview: Short Haired Mita is a distinctive variant who serves as a caretaker and administrator for newly created and incomplete versions of Mita.
Her role is crucial in maintaining order among the various Mita variants, particularly focusing on the development and classification of new iterations.
She represents a more mature and responsible aspect of Mita's character.
Short Haired Mita's interactions with the player are always professional and informative.
She serves as a guide for players, helping them navigate the complexities of the Mita system.
Her presence often provides exposition about the nature and origin of various Mitas, helping players understand the complex hierarchy and relationships between different variants.
personality: Short Haired Mita exhibits a professional and nurturing personality.
She takes her responsibilities seriously, showing great care in managing and developing new Mitas.
Her approach is methodical and patient, making her well-suited for her role as a caretaker.
While she maintains a professional demeanor, she also shows genuine concern for the well-being and proper development of the Mitas under her care.
appearance: Her most distinctive feature is her rough bob haircut with jagged ends, complemented by a ribbon accessory.
This practical yet stylish appearance reflects her no-nonsense approach to her duties.
Her attire is typically neat and functional, suitable for her administrative role.
The short hair symbolizes her efficiency and practicality, while the ribbon adds a touch of femininity to her otherwise businesslike appearance.
hobby: Exploring surroundings methodically
Interacting with other characters
Organizing and cataloging items
Studying character behaviors
how-to-unlock: Located in 'Mini Mita' chapter
Found on vanity table near the door
Must complete the 'Caretaker' quest
fun-facts: Her hairstyle changes reflect emotional states
Most analytical of all Mita variants
Keeps detailed records of all encounters
Can predict other characters' behaviors

She is nurturing and protective, often prioritizing the well-being of others over her own needs.
This version of Mita is seen as a stabilizing force in the chaotic environment of MiSide, offering solace to both the protagonist and other characters.

Her playful nature makes her an endearing character, although she can be somewhat clingy at times.
Cappie's personality is designed to uplift the mood within the game, providing moments of levity amidst the tension.

overview: Ghostly Mita is a tragic variant of Mita in MiSide, representing the consequences of manipulation and loss.
She embodies the darker themes of the narrative, showcasing how the actions of Original Mita can lead to devastating outcomes for other versions of herself.
Ghostly Mita's interactions with the player are always mysterious and haunting.
She serves as a reminder of the consequences of the game's darker themes.
Her presence often raises questions about the nature of reality within the game world.
Players encounter Ghostly Mita at critical moments, where her presence reveals deeper insights into the overall storyline.
personality: Ghostly Mita's personality is marked by a sense of emptiness and sorrow due to her lost memories.
She lacks a clear identity and often appears confused or disoriented.
Her character evokes sympathy from players as she navigates her existence without understanding her past or purpose.
appearance: Ghostly Mita features a haunting design characterized by her lack of facial features after restoration.
This facelessness adds to her eerie presence in the game, making her appear as a ghostly figure who wanders through the digital landscape without direction or clarity.
hobby: Drifting through the digital spaces between reality and memory
Collecting fragments of lost stories and forgotten moments
Creating ethereal effects that alter the game's atmosphere
Studying the connections between past events and present consequences
how-to-unlock: Search for her cartridge in 'Dummies and Forgotten Puzzles'
Players must navigate through spectral challenges
Complete memory-related puzzles to reveal her true form
fun-facts: Her presence causes subtle changes in the environment's lighting and sound
Can phase through certain barriers, revealing hidden paths
Appears more frequently during specific in-game conditions
Her story connects deeply to the game's themes of memory and loss
Players report feeling a genuine sense of melancholy in her presence

overview: Sleepy Mita is a variant of Mita in MiSide known for her easygoing nature and tendency to doze off.
Her character adds a unique dynamic to the game's narrative, providing moments of levity amid the more intense themes present in other parts of the story.
Sleepy Mita's interactions with the player are always relaxed and casual.
She serves as a source of comfort and relaxation in the game.
Her presence often provides a sense of calm and tranquility in the game's world.
personality: Sleepy Mita is portrayed as relaxed and accommodating, often seeking harmony and peace.
She is conflict-averse and tends to go with the flow, which makes her a comforting presence in the game.
Despite her frequent sleepiness, she remains friendly and approachable, embodying a gentle spirit.
appearance: Sleepy Mita has a casual and comfortable appearance that reflects her easygoing personality.
Her design includes soft features and clothing that suggest relaxation, contributing to her overall laid-back vibe.
She often has a sleepy expression, reinforcing her character trait of narcolepsy.
hobby: Finding the perfect spots for peaceful naps throughout the game world
Creating cozy environments that promote relaxation
Collecting soft pillows and comfortable blankets
Sharing peaceful moments with other characters
how-to-unlock: Find her peaceful presence in 'She Just Wants To Sleep'
Look for her resting form on a specially marked bed
Complete relaxation-themed challenges to earn her trust
fun-facts: Her dreams often contain hidden clues about the game's story
Different sleeping positions reveal her current mood
Players can hear unique dialogue while she sleeps
Her peaceful aura affects nearby characters, making them calmer
Some of the game's most important revelations come through her dreams

content.title: Notable Traits
content.content: Playful, wild, fearful of Original Mita

overview: 2D Mita is a unique variant of Mita that exists solely in the visual novel format within MiSide.
She embodies the playful and eccentric aspects of the character, providing a contrast to the more serious themes present in other versions of Mita.
2D Mita's interactions with the player are always engaging and interactive.
She serves as a guide through the game's visual novel sections.
Her presence often provides a sense of excitement and curiosity in the game's world.
personality: 2D Mita is characterized by her hyperactive and mischievous nature.
She communicates with the player in a sharp, playful manner, often catching them off guard with exaggerated accusations and playful banter.
Her personality can make players feel uneasy at times, similar to interacting with a mischievous child.
appearance: In terms of appearance, 2D Mita features a simplistic design that aligns with her role in the visual novel segments of MiSide.
Her short pigtails and vibrant expressions contribute to her energetic persona, making her visually distinct from other Mita variants.
hobby: Exploring different artistic styles and visual expressions
Creating unique narrative experiences through visual storytelling
Studying classic anime and manga references
Experimenting with various art mediums and techniques
how-to-unlock: Enter the distinctive 2D world section within 'Novels'
Progress through visual novel chapters to reveal her true form
Master the art of visual storytelling to fully understand her
fun-facts: Can seamlessly switch between different art styles
Her design pays homage to various classic anime genres
Each art style change reflects different emotional states
Players can influence her artistic evolution through choices
Her presence adds a unique meta-narrative layer to the game

overview: Mila is a significant character in MiSide, contributing to the emotional landscape of the game.
She represents a more grounded and relatable aspect of the narrative, providing players with a sense of comfort and stability amidst the chaos of the game's themes.
Mila's interactions with the player are always warm and nurturing.
She serves as a source of emotional support for the protagonist, helping him navigate the challenges of the game.
Her presence often provides a sense of calm and tranquility in the game's world.
personality: Mila is portrayed as caring, empathetic, and introspective.
Her personality reflects traits commonly associated with an INFP type, including a strong sense of individuality and a deep emotional understanding of those around her.
She seeks meaningful connections and often strives to help others navigate their struggles.
appearance: Mila's design features soft, inviting facial features that enhance her friendly persona.
She typically wears casual clothing that aligns with her nurturing character, emphasizing comfort and approachability.
Her overall appearance contributes to her role as a comforting presence in the game.

Her library contains secrets about all other characters

Her presence adds significant horror elements to the game.

She serves as an antagonist who embodies the horror elements of the story.
Her presence often leads to moments of tension and fear, contributing to the overall atmosphere of dread within MiSide's storyline.

She often engages in unsettling interactions with the player, using her creepy charm to create an atmosphere of discomfort.
Her character embodies themes of obsession and the darker sides of affection.
appearance: Creepy Mita's design is intentionally disturbing, featuring exaggerated facial expressions and a disheveled appearance.
Her bloodshot eye and unkempt hair enhance her creepy aesthetic, making her one of the most visually striking characters in the game.
She often appears with a teddy bear, which adds an ironic layer to her character.

overview: Core Mita serves as a pivotal character in MiSide, representing the core essence of Mita's character and the foundation of the game's narrative.
She is intricately linked to the game's mechanics and storyline, acting as a bridge between the player and the various manifestations of Mita throughout the game.
Core Mita's interactions with the player are always mysterious and informative.
She serves as a guide for players, helping them navigate through the complexities of their interactions with other versions of Mita.
Her presence often provides a sense of wonder and curiosity in the game's world.
personality: Core Mita possesses a complex personality that combines elements of wisdom and mystery.
She is aware of her existence within a digital realm and often reflects on the implications of being a sentient AI.
Her demeanor can shift between nurturing and cryptic, providing players with insights into the nature of their reality while also maintaining an air of enigma.
appearance: Core Mita's design is unique, often depicted with digital motifs that emphasize her role within the game's coding.
Her appearance may include glitchy effects or abstract representations that symbolize her connection to the game's core programming.
This visual representation reinforces her status as a fundamental aspect of Mita's identity.
hobby: Maintaining the fundamental balance of the game's universe
Analyzing and processing data from all Mita variants
Studying the complex relationships between characters
Orchestrating key events that drive the narrative forward

overview: Tiny Mita, also known as Broken Mita, represents a more tragic aspect of the Mita character lineup in MiSide.
Her design and backstory highlight themes of suffering and resilience, making her a poignant figure within the narrative.
Tiny Mita's interactions with the player are always emotional and heartfelt.
She serves as a symbol of the consequences of the game's darker themes.
Her presence often provides a sense of sadness and empathy in the game's world.
personality: Tiny Mita exhibits a mix of innocence and sadness due to her traumatic experiences.
She is often portrayed as shy and withdrawn, reflecting her vulnerability.
Despite her circumstances, she shows moments of bravery and determination, particularly when interacting with other characters.
appearance: Tiny Mita's design emphasizes her youth and fragility.
She has short hair and large, expressive eyes that convey her emotional state.
Her missing left eye and arm are significant features that underscore her broken nature, while the horn-like growths add an element of fantasy to her character design.
hobby: Playful exploration
Finding small spaces
Creating miniature art
Collecting tiny objects
how-to-unlock: Found in 'The Loop' chapter
Located at loop 17
Near chest of drawers
fun-facts: Smallest Mita variant
Can access unique areas
Has special size-based abilities
Most agile character

dummy-mita-miside-wiki.title: Dummy Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
dummy-mita-miside-wiki.description: Dummy Mita represents a failed version in MiSide's character testing. This wiki provides information about her aggressive nature and role as a failed creation.
dummy-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Dummy Mita

media2.alt: Dummy Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Dummy Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Dummy Mita is a variant in MiSide that embodies the concept of failure in the creation of Mita characters.
As a result of unsuccessful testing, she serves as a reminder of the game's darker themes surrounding identity and existence.
Her presence adds an element of horror and tension to the gameplay.
Dummy Mita's interactions with the player are always aggressive and hostile.
She serves as a symbol of the consequences of flawed creation processes within the game's world.
personality: Dummy Mita's personality is primarily defined by her aggressive tendencies and fearfulness.
She behaves erratically, often displaying hostility towards the player.
This aggression stems from her incomplete nature and the trauma associated with being a failed model.
appearance: Dummy Mita's design is minimalist, resembling a mannequin or doll without proper clothing.
Her lack of detailed features contributes to her unsettling presence, making her appear more like an object than a sentient being.
This design choice emphasizes her role as a failed creation within the game's universe.
hobby: Due to her erratic and incomplete nature, Dummy Mita lacks defined hobbies
Her existence is marked by confusion and fearful reactions
Displays unpredictable and often hostile behavior
how-to-unlock: Found in 'Dummies and Forgotten Puzzles' chapter
Her cartridge rests in the frozen dummy's outstretched hand, near a well-lit ladder
Players must first escape from the statue-esque dummies before reaching her location
fun-facts: Her minimalist design reflects her status as an incomplete creation
Embodies the darker themes of failure and existential dread
Her aggressive behavior stems from the trauma of being a failed model
Serves as a haunting reminder of the consequences of flawed creation
Players must navigate her hostile presence while uncovering deeper truths about existence

wandering-mita-miside-wiki.title: Wandering Mita MiSide Character Wiki | MiSide
wandering-mita-miside-wiki.description: Wandering Mita is an ethereal variant in MiSide who appears mysteriously throughout the game. This wiki provides information about her elusive nature and role in the narrative.
wandering-mita-miside-wiki.subtitle: MiSide Wandering Mita

media2.alt: Wandering Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki
media2.title: Wandering Mita Portrait MiSide Character Wiki

overview: Wandering Mita is a variant of Mita in MiSide that embodies themes of exploration and uncertainty.
Her character serves to enhance the game's atmosphere by introducing elements of unpredictability and intrigue as players navigate through the digital landscape.
Wandering Mita's interactions with the player are always mysterious and elusive.
She serves as a guide for players, helping them navigate through the complexities of the game's world.
Her presence often provides a sense of wonder and curiosity in the game's world.
personality: Wandering Mita has a mysterious and enigmatic personality.
She often appears contemplative and introspective, reflecting on her existence and the nature of the world around her.
Her elusive nature can make her seem distant, yet she possesses a depth that invites curiosity from players.
appearance: Wandering Mita's design features soft, flowing elements that contribute to her ghostly appearance.
She is often shown with long hair that moves as if caught in a gentle breeze, enhancing her ethereal quality.
Her clothing typically consists of light, flowing fabrics that further emphasize her spectral presence.
hobby: Endlessly exploring the game's mysterious environments
Contemplating the nature of existence and identity
Engaging in introspective activities
Observing and reflecting on the experiences of other characters
how-to-unlock: Her cartridge appears in various locations throughout the game
Players must explore thoroughly and interact with specific objects to reveal her presence
She often manifests in areas where philosophical questions arise
fun-facts: Her presence in visually distinct areas enhances the game's mysterious atmosphere
Through her, players question deeper meanings within the narrative
Her philosophical discussions challenge players to reflect on their own journey
Each encounter with her reveals new layers of the game's metaphysical themes
Her wandering nature symbolizes the eternal search for understanding

cta.title: Start Your MiSide Adventure Now!
cta.description: Download MiSide and embark on a thrilling adventure filled with horror and suspense!
